title: adidas Group - revenue from H1 2017 to H1 2019 , by region
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2018.
In Half 1st half 2017, Emerging Markets had the highest Revenue in million euros among all 3 Halfs and it has the lowest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2018.
The maximum Revenue in million euros for Emerging Markets that was found in Half 1st half 2017 was 1.15 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros observed in Half 1st half 2018.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Revenue in million euros on the Y-axis for 3 different Halfs for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2018.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2018.
In Half 1st half 2017, Emerging Markets had the highest Revenue in million euros among all 3 Halfs and it has the lowest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2018.
The maximum Revenue in million euros for Emerging Markets that was found in Half 1st half 2017 was 1.15 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros observed in Half 1st half 2018.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Halfs on X-axis for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in million euros.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest Revenue in million euros in Half 1st half 2018.
In Half 1st half 2017, Emerging Markets had the maximum Revenue in million euros and it saw the lowest in Half 1st half 2018 out of all 3 Halfs.
There is a gap of 84.0 between the highest and lowest Revenue in million euros found for Emerging Markets in Half 1st half 2017 and 1st half 2018.
Among the groups, Asia-Pacific had the biggest difference in Revenue in million euros. Where the maximum Revenue in million euros was 1.24 times larger than the minimum Revenue in million euros.

Asia-Pacific had the maximum Revenue in million euros out of all 6 groups in Half 1st half 2019 followed by Asia-Pacific in 1st half 2019, and the minimum Revenue in million euros is found for Russia/CIS in 1st half 2018.

On average, the Half 1st half 2019 had the highest Revenue in million euros for all 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. Whereas 1st half 2017 had the lowest average Revenue in million euros.
